snippet: Fifth Third Bancorp, Ameren and ConAgra Foods are among the companies that would be the most vulnerable to takeover by activist investors, a new study by a research firm finds.
abstract: Fifth Third Bancorp, Ameren and ConAgra Foods are among the companies that would be the most vulnerable to takeover by activist investors, a new study by a research firm finds.

headline.main: Report Identifies Companies Vulnerable to Activist Takeovers
